name: CyCriSec Profile
tagline: UML Profile for the CyCriSec project
body:
# cycrisec-Profile
UML Profile for the CyCriSec project

# Installing the Profile

In Eclipse, go to `Help -> Install New Software...` and use http://cycrisec-project.github.io/cycrisec-Profile/updates as the URL for the update site.

# Contents
## io.github.cycrisec-project.Profile.updatesite

Ready-to-use *Update Site* to install the CyCriSec Profile.

## org.eclipse.uml2.uml

This plugin is a patched version of `org.eclipse.uml2.uml` that eases the generation of Profile based on Papyrus MARTE.
It is only required for generating the Ecore file that implements a UML profile.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
